item.title: 复星珠宝旗下上海豫园考虑在香港二次上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，经营范围涵盖珠宝店和文化遗址的上海豫园旅游商城集团股份有限公司正在考虑在香港第二次上市。【原文：Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Group Co., which has operations spanning jewelry stores to cultural sites, is contemplating a second listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着预算案的临近，印度道路开发商希望迎来更好的时代
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度科技股 110 亿美元涨势或因盈利不佳而止步
item.description: 印度领先技术服务公司的盈利不佳引发了人们的担忧，该行业将很难证明自美国总统大选以来的 110 亿美元涨势是合理的。【原文：Earnings misses by leading Indian technology services companies are raising concern that the sector will struggle to justify an $11 billion rally since the US presidential election.】

item.title: 中国煤炭和天然气产量创新高，但钢铁产量下降
item.description: 2024 年，中国煤炭、天然气和铝等大宗商品的产量均创历史新高。钢铁产量虽然连续第五年保持在 10 亿吨以上，但仍有所下降。【原文：China posted record production in 2024 for commodities including coal, gas and aluminum. Steel output dropped, although it held above 1 billion tons for a fifth consecutive year.】

item.title: 越南航运巨头在特朗普关税时代收入增长三倍
item.description: 越南海运公司（Vietnam Maritime Corp.）总经理 Nguyen Canh Tinh 表示，新上任的特朗普政府可能会征收关税，这有可能抑制越南的贸易，但越南海运公司对此毫不畏惧，预计未来十年的收入将增加两倍多。【原文：Vietnam Maritime Corp., undaunted by potential tariffs from the incoming Trump administration that risk crimping the nation’s trade, forecasts revenue to more than triple in the next decade, General Director Nguyen Canh Tinh said.】

item.title: 即使新生儿增多，中国人口仍连续第三年减少
item.description: 2024 年，尽管出生人数略有上升，但中国人口已连续第三年出现萎缩，这凸显出中国经济仍存在长期风险。【原文：China’s population shrank for the third straight year in 2024, even though births rose slightly, underscoring a lingering long—term risk for the economy.】

item.title: 在刺激政策的推动下，中国 2024 年经济增长达到 5%的官方目标
item.description: 中国去年的经济扩张达到了政府的年度目标，因为大胆的刺激政策推动了最后一个季度的经济活动，使增长目标重新变得触手可及。【原文：China’s economic expansion met the government’s annual target last year, as a bold stimulus push turbocharged activity in the final quarter and brought the growth goal back within reach.】

item.title: 中国房价降幅放缓，刺激政策初见成效
item.description: 12 月份，中国房价降幅连续第四个月收窄，反映出在政府实施最新的刺激政策之后，市场出现了企稳迹象。【原文：China’s decline in home prices abated for a fourth month in December, reflecting signs of market stabilization after the government’s latest stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 印度中产阶级陷入困境，HDFC 银行和印度斯坦联合利华受到挤压
item.description: 印度工资下降和通胀高企将削弱 HDFC Bank Ltd.、Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. 和 Hindustan Unilever Ltd. 的盈利，因为这些贷款机构正为资产质量恶化做准备，而消费品公司则在与吝啬的客户作斗争。【原文：Falling wages and high inflation in India will have dented earnings at HDFC Bank Ltd., Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. and Hindustan Unilever Ltd. as the lenders brace for an asset quality deterioration and consumer firms grapple with penny-pinching customers.】

item.title: 中国富豪的香港豪宅降价 60
item.description: 一家银行试图出售香港一栋原为中国房地产大亨所有的豪宅，该银行已将其价格下调了约 60%，反映出高端房地产需求不振。【原文：A bank trying to unload a luxury mansion in Hong Kong formerly owned by a Chinese property tycoon has slashed its price by about 60%, reflecting the tepid demand for high-end real estate.】

item.title: 刺激政策存疑，中国面临黯淡财报季
item.description: 分析师认为，中国的经济刺激政策来得太晚，而且力度太小，不足以对全年企业利润产生重大影响，这将使投资者面临一个令人失望的财报季。【原文：China’s stimulus blitz came too late and was too small to have a major impact on full-year corporate profits, according to analysts, setting investors up for a disappointing earnings season.】

item.title: SpaceX 碎片坠入飞机航道后航班改道
item.description: 周四，SpaceX 星际飞船试飞失败后发生爆炸，捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways Corp.【原文：Commercial flights operated by JetBlue Airways Corp. and American Airlines Group Inc. were forced to take avoidance action after a failed SpaceX Starship test flight exploded on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国将公布经济数据，通货紧缩螺旋风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 2025年1月2日，星期四，中国上海，日出时分，一名行人在浦东陆家嘴金融区大楼对面的外滩慢跑。中国国家主席习近平表示，预计2024年全年中国国内生产总值将增长5%左右，这标志着这个世界第二大经济体有望实现其官方目标。【原文：A pedestrian jogs along the Bund across from buildings in Pudong's Lujiazui Financial District during sunrise in Shanghai, China, on Thursday, Jan. 2, 2025. China’s gross domestic product is expected to expand around 5% for the full year of 2024, President Xi Jinping said, signaling the world’s second-largest economy is on track to meet its official target.】

item.title: 会议临近，掉期交易员纷纷押注日本央行加息
item.description: 在短短几天时间里，掉期市场交易商将赌注提高到几乎肯定日本央行将在下周的会议上加息。【原文：In the span of just a couple of days, swap market traders raised their bets to near certainty of an interest-rate hike by the Bank of Japan at its meeting next week.】

item.title: 新西兰敦促加拿大下任领导人解决乳制品问题
item.description: 新西兰正敦促加拿大下任总理回应竞争对手乳制品出口商关于加拿大向世界市场倾销低价牛奶产品的说法。【原文：New Zealand is urging Canada’s next prime minister to respond to claims from rival dairy exporters that it is dumping low-price milk products on world markets.】

item.title: AlixPartners 所有者考虑出售咨询公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，AlixPartners 的私募股权所有者正在探讨出售这家美国咨询公司的可能性。【原文：The private equity owners of AlixPartners are exploring a potential sale of the US consulting firm, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Qorvo 因《华尔街日报》报道 Starboard 持股 7.7% 而大幅上涨
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Starboard Value 公司已持有这家美国芯片制造商 7.7% 的股份，并计划推动变革以提高其股价，此后 Qorvo 公司股价在延时交易中大涨。【原文：Qorvo Inc. shares surged in extended trading after the Wall Street Journal reported that Starboard Value has amassed a 7.7% stake in the US chipmaker and plans to push for changes to boost its stock price.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将于 2 月 1 日任命下台的中央银行董事会成员
item.description: 据一位熟悉相关讨论的高级官员透露，哥伦比亚总统府将于 2 月 1 日发布一项法令，任命其将要更换的两名中央银行董事会成员。【原文：Colombia’s presidency will publish a decree Feb. 1 naming the two central bank board members it is replacing, according to a senior official familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 市场为特朗普做准备，石油有望实现四周连涨
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的第二个任期到来之前，石油将迎来第四次周线上涨，交易商们正在寻求影响深远的制裁和贸易政策的明朗化。【原文：Oil headed for a fourth weekly gain ahead of President-elect Donald Trump’s second term, with traders seeking clarity on far-reaching sanctions and trade policies.】

item.title: 纳斯达克提交的表格是获得美国证券交易委员会批准的关键，莱特币 ETF 日益临近
item.description: 纳斯达克（Nasdaq）和金丝雀资本集团（Canary Capital Group）本周向美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）提交了新的文件，这些文件是获得监管机构批准现货莱特币 ETF 的关键。【原文：Nasdaq and Canary Capital Group submitted new filings to the US Securities and Exchange Commission this week that are key to gaining the regulator’s approval for a spot Litecoin ETF.】

item.title: 拜登顾问警告特朗普若插手美联储将面临通胀风险
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的一位高级经济顾问警告说，唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府如果干预美联储的利率决策，就有可能重新引发通货膨胀。【原文：A top economic adviser to President Joe Biden warned that Donald Trump’s incoming administration risks reigniting inflation if it interferes with the Federal Reserve’s policymaking on interest rates.】

item.title: 报道嘉能可交易谈判后力拓股价下跌
item.description: 据彭博新闻社早些时候报道，全球第二大矿业公司力拓集团与嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）就交易进行了早期谈判，此后力拓集团股价在悉尼下跌达 1.8%。【原文：Rio Tinto Group shares fell as much as 1.8% in Sydney after Bloomberg News earlier reported the world’s second-biggest miner held early-stage talks with Glencore Plc about a deal.】

item.title: 索尼又取消两个 PlayStation 项目
item.description:
公司告诉 Bend 和 Bluepoint 子公司，公司将与它们合作确定下一步措施，并最大限度地减少失业

。【原文：

The company told subsidiaries Bend and Bluepoint it will work with them to determine their next steps and minimize job losses

】

item.title: 中国黑客在美国财政部入侵事件中访问了耶伦的电脑
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士称，美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦的电脑被入侵，非机密文件被调阅，这是中国国家支持的黑客入侵美国财政部的广泛事件的一部分。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen’s computer was infiltrated and unclassified files were accessed as part of a broader breach of the agency by Chinese state-sponsored hackers, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国向特朗普摊牌，人民币和股市受到威胁
item.description: 对于中国的投资者来说，再次与美国打贸易战，除了 "过来人 "的感觉外，没有任何其他感觉。【原文：For investors in China, fighting another trade war with the US will feel like anything but been there and done that.】

item.title: 中国数据公布前，亚洲股市开局疲软：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市难以获得牵引力之后，亚洲股市似乎将下滑，因为交易员们正在为定于周五公布的包括第四季度经济增长在内的一系列中国数据做准备。【原文：Asian stocks look set to slip after US shares struggled to gain traction as traders prepared for a swath of Chinese data scheduled for release Friday including fourth quarter growth.】

item.title: 卡尼离开布鲁克菲尔德参政，弗拉特被任命为主席
item.description: 前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）在参加了领导加拿大自由党的竞选活动后，辞去了布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）董事长一职。【原文：Former central banker Mark Carney stepped down as chairman of Brookfield Asset Management after joining the campaign to lead the Liberal Party of Canada.】

item.title: 亚洲各国央行出人意料的举措显示了美元狂飙的影响
item.description: 印尼意外降息以及印度储备银行放松对卢比控制的迹象表明，各国央行抵御强势美元的防线开始崩溃。【原文：A surprise interest-rate cut in Indonesia and signs the Reserve Bank of India is loosening its tight grip on the rupee suggest central banks’ defense against a strong dollar is starting to crack.】

item.title: 全球人工智能军备竞赛取决于数据中心的使用权
item.description:
美国和英国正在推动扩大人工智能基础设施。【原文：

The US and UK are pushing to expand infrastructure for artificial intelligence.

】

item.title: 通用汽车与美国联邦贸易委员会就共享驾驶员数据达成和解
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会已与通用汽车公司达成和解，该公司声称通过收集驾驶员的个人数据并与第三方共享，欺骗了驾驶员。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission has reached a settlement with General Motors Co. over claims the automaker deceived drivers by collecting their personal data and sharing it with third parties.】
